Welcome to Marteq, a way for you to collect and control your data, and exchange it for rewards...as you see fit!

You'll be able to control data collection, data sharing and messaging from one place, and be rewarded for all your activity.

If you're here, that means you've successfully registered, and you're ready to download the extension to your Chrome browser. So please proceed: it's safe and easy. Once you've successfully loaded the app, you'll be in control.

Problems? Questions? Don't hesitate to contact us at support@cydigital.com.
